attributes.action: Reconsider the unjust and one sided extradition law between the UK and USA which will allow  the extradition of Aspergers sufferer Gary Mckinnon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: any U.K citizen can  be extradited to America on the strength of an allegation alone. These allegations are presented to our courts as Facts and accepted as such by our courts and Law Lords without the accused having any opportunity to challenge or rebut the allegations.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
